com.senacor.portal.sc.backend.service

Class ScService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.senacor.portal.sc.backend.service.ScService

  • @Service
public class ScService
extends java.lang.Object
    ScService is responsible for the whole SC management (request, creation, handling, closing,..)

                          java.lang.String categoryName,
                          java.lang.String goalTitle)
        Method for adding new goal (row) of Scorecard for Daily business or Project category
        Parameters:
        scId - Long - id of Scorecard
        categoryName - String expecting "dailyBusiness" or "project" value
        goalTitle - - title/name of goal/row
        Returns:
        ScResponse of just created Scorecard

      • publishDataReviewer

        public void publishDataReviewer(java.lang.Long scId,
                                SectionData data,
                                boolean withEvaluation)
        Saves all reviewer records - comments, assessments... by parameters into PUBLIC space This space is visible, so all records will be visible for employee
        Parameters:
        scId - Scorecard id
        data - SectionData containing reviewer data
        withEvaluation - determines, if evaluation should be also updated or not

      • publishDataEmployee

        public void publishDataEmployee(java.lang.Long scId,
                                SectionData data,
                                boolean withEvaluation)
        Saves all employee records - comments, assessments... by parameters into PUBLIC space This space is visible, so all records will be visible for reviewer
        Parameters:
        scId - Scorecard id
        data - SectionData containing employee data
        withEvaluation - determines, if evaluation should be also updated or not

      • updateScStatus

        public void updateScStatus(java.lang.Long scId,
                           java.lang.String newStatus,
                           EmployeeClassification employeeClassification,
                           DailyBusinessProjectDTO dailyBusinessProject)
        General method for updating status flags of Scorecard.
        Parameters:
        scId - Scorecard id
        newStatus - to be added, expected: SC_WITH_PR_CHOSEN, SC_WITHOUT_PR_CHOSEN, EMPLOYEE_PUBLISHED, REVIEWER_PUBLISHED, CLOSED, ARCHIVED
        employeeClassification - EmployeeClassification
        dailyBusinessProject - DailyBusinessProjectDTO instance

      • archiveAndCreateNewSc

        public java.lang.Long archiveAndCreateNewSc(java.lang.Long scId)
        Archives Scorecard - it will be no longer editable, visible in list of Scorecards for employee or reviewer... Besides of that it creates the new Scorecard for an owner of the archived scorecard
        Parameters:
        scId - Scorecard id for archivation
        Returns:
        Long id of created Scorecard
